cards.name: Aquarmor
cards.description: Aquarmor is a legendary pokemon of mythical power, residing in serene, river-like environments. Clad in ornate armor, this pokemon exudes a regal presence and commands respect from its peers. Its main weapon is the Hydro Burst, a formidable attack that unleashes a torrent of energy strong enough to break even the sturdiest of walls. In its daily life, Aquarmor can be spotted enjoying a leisurely swim in its natural habitat, or using its powerful Hydro Burst to create a beautiful light show for visitors.
cards.image_prompt: Aquarmor::0 a legendary water-type pokemon::2.5, wearing ornate armor, in a river environment, sparkling blue background, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
